price: 26 Allah les a couverts d’opprobre ici-bas, mais le châtiment de l’au-delà sera bien plus terrible. S’ils pouvaient en être conscients !
arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-adhāqahumu al-lahu al-khiz'ya fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
